15421122.content:
He transports the basket to the laundry room, and the constant jostling only causes you to fall deeper into the reeking clothes.

But, you have to escape or face drowning in some enormous clothes-washing machine.

He puts the basket down on the tile floor in the laundry room, fishing in his pockets for coins.

Suddenly, he drops coins, which clang all over the floor. If you rush out onto the floor near the coins, maybe he will see you.
